long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly manage your Kubernetes clusters right from your browser with Kuby! This powerful Chrome extension is designed for DevOps engineers, Kubernetes administrators, Web Developers and anyone who needs quick and easy access to manage/check Kubernetes resources.

Key Features:

- Seamless Kubernetes Management: Connect to your Kubernetes clusters, whether they're on-premises or in the cloud, with a simple and secure setup.
- Real-time Pod Monitoring: View all the pods in your selected namespace with live updates. Stay on top of your deployments with ease.
- Log Viewer: Inspect the latest logs of your pods with a click. Our convenient modal window displays the last 200 lines of logs, with an option to download the full log file.
- Instant Pod Control: Delete pods directly from the interface and get immediate feedback with notification alerts.
- Secure and Localized: Your kubeconfig stays local, and credentials are never shared, ensuring your cluster's security.
Whether you're troubleshooting, monitoring, or managing your Kubernetes resources, Kuby provides a user-friendly interface to enhance your productivity and make Kubernetes management more accessible than ever.

Get started in minutes and bring the power of Kubernetes to your fingertips with Kuby – the essential tool for modern Kubernetes management!
